actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-39.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution providing funds for investigations and studies for the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-39) Authorizes expenditures, not to exceed $1,400,000, by the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries for investigations and studies. Prohibits any part of such funds from being available for expenditure in connection with the study of any subject which is being investigated for the same purpose by any other House committee. Terminates the authorization granted by this resolution on January 3, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution providing funds for investigations and studies for the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
